fields.description: A unique name for the persona, often a fictional name that reflects the character’s role or key characteristic.
fields.label: Fictional Name

fields.description: The primary role or job title the persona occupies in the context of using your product or service.
fields.label: Role

fields.description: Basic demographic information to help in understanding who the persona is.
fields.label: Demographics

fields.description: Primary objectives or what the persona aims to achieve by using your product or service.
fields.label: Goals

fields.description: The main challenges, pain points, or frustrations the persona faces, which your product or service seeks to address.
fields.label: Challenges

fields.description: What drives the persona to look for solutions? This includes both intrinsic and extrinsic motivations.
fields.label: Motivations

fields.description: How and where the persona prefers to receive information or interact with your product or service (e.g., social media, email, in-person).
fields.label: Preferred Channels
